features: 【EXQUISITE MAGNETIC TOY SET】:This magnetic balls and rods set has 56 pieces, an idea booklet and a storage bag. It is fun and educational. It can develop children's imagination, creativity, 3D spatial thinking, logic skills, color and shape recognition. It is a perfect educational gift for boys and girls aged 3 4 5 6 years.

【SAFE & DURABLE】: The educational building blocks toys is made of high-quality ABS material. Designed with rounded edges to ensure safety and a smooth feel, better sealing, perfect protection against breakage. A great learning gift and magnetic toy for boys and girls aged 3+!

【STEM BUILDING TOYS】: Magnetic building balls and sticks toys are perfect for STEM education. Kids can use it to easily build 2D or 3D shapes. It can help children understand the knowledge of geometry, and be able to build basic concepts of planes and three dimensions.

【LEARN BY PLAY】: Play is the most important way for children to learn. Magnetic block sticks will encourage children's creativity. It is easy to build houses, castles, airplanes, rockets, puppies and much more. Children can use their imagination to build any shape.

【PERFECT EDUCATIONAL TOYS GIFTS】: The magnetic building sticks set is an educational toy for children aged 3 4 5 6 years, let your kids enjoy this 3D magnetic block sticks on their own or with their peers. Let this magnetic toy bring joy and fun to your child. Also, this is a perfect gift toy for birthdays, Christmas or any other important holiday and occasion!（Buying multiple sets of magnetic sticks toys can achieve all the whimsy and cool looks you want！）

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little building magnets
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 3 year old, and I’ll say her imagination takes over with the pieces more than she likes to “build” with it. She pretends she’s cooking “eggs & hotdogs”. Of course not all kids are going to pretend they’re cooking. But I’d say a 4/5 year old would probably appreciate this toy more than my 3 & a half year old. I had more fun with it than my daughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for grandkids for Christmas! Love to see them use thier imagination. These allow them to build whatever their little hearts desire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kiddos loved it
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my niece and I'm pretty sure everyone at the birthday party was playing with these, even the adults. This is a really fun toy for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My kids have had a good time playing with these. I docked it a star because the magnet isn't very strong so what ever you construct falls very easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these magnetic blocks set
reviews.reviewText: Easy to build for my four-year-old granddaughter to build and so many creative possibilities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The hold of the magnet.
reviews.reviewText: These look awesome when you see them and then they do not stay together like I think they should! 😞

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My friends daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a gift for my friend's 4 year old daughter. As soon as she opened it up, she got attracted to it. She spent the entire time playing it while we were there chatting with our friend. Needless to say it was a right choice of gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong magnets.
